title: EOT TV - Eye On Travel TV
creator: Blue Wave Media

extendedInfo.description: Hosts Tim Alan and Amy Rogers escort you around the world to the finest resorts throughout the US and abroad. Here you will be able to map out your next vacation AND budget it! Tim Alan has taken the time to locate the best spots for everyone from family fun, to that romantic weekend getaway. Not only will you be able to get your public hot spot fix but you will also be informed on RV interests and camping. Dining, location history, excursions and theme park adventures are all covered in the free streaming episodes. This show captures viewers of all ages along with entertaining them with beautiful travel scenery and exciting travel destinations.
